attributes.review: This app is so awful! I literally couldn’t get past the view of an ugly orange Cheeto. The face of the Cheeto was all Over the app! It was disgusting! And second of all, it’s literally false news! Everything about it has false, misleading information that shouldn’t be on the app! I do not recommend this for ANYONE!
attributes.title: Absolute Garbage

attributes.review: if anyone asked me what the worst app in existence was a couple days ago, i would have answered with something like “life 360”. after downloading this app i can tell u that THIS is the worst app to exist. as soon as i downloaded it i immediately regretted it. please, don’t make the the mistake as me and PLEASE don’t download this.
attributes.title: worst app to exist

attributes.review: If I could rate it a 0/10 I would. It took almost a week to down load! When I opened it, it showed me a orange and a fat cheese puff!! It made me traumatized for a week!!  You can do nothing on the app. Not recommended at all. This app should be deleted before anyone else gets traumatize like me. 😢 #Anonymous2020
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: who even created this app because they should be fired. my keyboard is keeps on glitching and the amount of ads was horrible. I could barely read any news because they kept on popping up. literally who would ever use this app happily, it gives me a headache.
attributes.title: Dump trumps app designer this is trash

attributes.review: There are a whole lot of people who support that abomination to society on here. I guess they support a racist, transphobic, homophobic, rapist, idiot. Well that’s really unfortunate. These people are clearly idiots. They make the user experience unbearable. They say we shouldn’t rate the app based on the president. But the president is the one who originated the idea of this app. F Trump2020
attributes.title: Horrible Experience

attributes.review: Fix or app trump I can’t believe your just so bad get this off our App Store kid. Apple do something . Oh my gawd
attributes.title: This app is 🗑

attributes.review: this app is completely terrible, it’s is horrific😤🤚🏽there is no need for this, if anything my a 3 year olds app is utterly better than this✨🥰 it made my phone glitch so bad😔now, all i have left is to leave a bad review😍 ohhhh to see without my eyes👁👄👁, anyways sir, nobody appreciates this app🙈 apple store please take it down🥺🦋💫
attributes.title: DisGusTIng🙈

attributes.review: Okay first off, when I downloaded this app it glitched out like da faq?? And second off, this app isn’t even fun. Where are the games? Where’s the candy crush? Where’s the fun??? All I see is news news news. And I’m siCk of it it’s absolutely disgusting. This app should be taken off the app store
attributes.title: Disgasting programming

attributes.review: THIS APP IS THE WORST! If I could give it 0 stars I would. First it took waaaaaaaaay too long to download. Then it takes forever to open when you click on it. Once you are finally in it doesn’t get much better the app is just a mess I would not recommend this app to anyone ever!

This app made my phone go slow this app is so horrible that it just started playing music out of nowhere so I have to hurry up and delete it but when I was deleting the app it didn’t delete I still got messages from Trump about the coronavirus and all that stuff I hate trump trump 2020 is canceled OK
attributes.title: WORST APP POSSIBLE
